AIContentLoaderProtocol Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in AIContentLoaderProtocol.h

Overview

protocol for defining content loader methods

– initWithAppInfra:serviceId:maxAgeInHours:modelClass:contentType:downloadLimit: required method

Create intance with the following params

- (nullable instancetype)initWithAppInfra:(id<AIAppInfraProtocol> _Nonnull)appInfra serviceId:(NSString *_Nonnull)serviceId maxAgeInHours:(NSInteger)maxAgeInHours modelClass:(Class _Nonnull)modelClass contentType:(NSString *_Nonnull)contentType downloadLimit:(NSUInteger)downloadLimit

Parameters

appInfra

AppInfra instance
serviceId

serviceId of the cq5 url
maxAgeInHours

expery time for the contents cached
modelClass

name of the model class
contentType

type of the content
downloadLimit

no of pages that should be downloaded in one attempt. This will override the limit set in the app config. Pass ‘0’ for taking the default limit from app config.

Return Value

content loader instance

Availability

1.1.0

Declared In

AIContentLoaderProtocol.h

– refresh: required method

Refresh content in cache. If database is empty, loads from server. If content is outdated, starts download from server. If content URL has changed (e.g. locale changed) the cached content is automatically cleared and download is started.

- (void)refresh:(nullable void ( ^ ) ( AICLRefreshResult refreshResult , NSError *_Nullable error ))completionHandler

Parameters

completionHandler

asynchronous callback reporting result of refresh

Availability

1.1.0

Declared In

AIContentLoaderProtocol.h

– clearCache required method

Remove all cached content

- (void)clearCache

Availability

1.1.0

Declared In

AIContentLoaderProtocol.h

– getStatus required method

Used to get the current status of the contentloader

- (AICLState)getStatus

Return Value

content loader status

Availability

1.1.0

AIContentLoaderProtocol.h

– getAllContent: required method

used to get all the contents

Parameters

completionHandler

returns array of contents along with the error object

– getContentByTags:operatorName:completionHandler: required method

used to get the contents based on tag
